tool_description: Analyzes review patterns and metadata to detect spam, bot-generated, or promotional content using multiple detection algorithms.

review_text.description: The review text to analyze for spam characteristics

user_id.description: Unique identifier of the user who posted the review

user_review_count.description: Total number of reviews posted by this user

account_age_days.description: Age of user account in days

check_promotional_content.description: Whether to check for promotional or advertising content

error_messages: Invalid user data: user_id cannot be empty and user_review_count must be non-negative
Invalid timestamp: posting_timestamp must be valid ISO 8601 format
Invalid account age: account_age_days must be non-negative integer
Invalid similarity threshold: similarity_threshold must be between 0 and 1
Missing review text: review_text cannot be empty
usage: Provide review text and user metadata to analyze spam probability. Set check_promotional_content and similarity_threshold for customized detection sensitivity.

spam_probability.description: Probability that the review is spam (0-1)

is_promotional.description: Whether the review appears to be promotional content

risk_level.description: Overall spam risk level: low, medium, high
